comments:
Build ID: I-I200703291236

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install I-I200703291236
2. Run a top down or Bottom Up Scenario
3. Notice error: Error when copying Axis jar files to web project.


More information:
The stack trace is:

This stack trace indicates that the call to  Platform.getBundle( bundleId ) in BundleUtils returns null.  I think this is because we are passing in a bundleId of org.apache.commons_logging.  This plugin has been converted to a jar recently and has been renamed org.apache.commons.logging.

Either commons_logging needs to be reverted to its old form, or we need to update the Web Services code to deal with loading files from this jar.

David, as discussed, please roll back the change in moving the common-logging JAR for this week's integration build.  We'll re-tackle moving the Axis JARs after M6 and we'll make the other necessary change to make sure we copy from the right plugin.

Changes rolled back ... should be back to commons_logging 
in next build > I20070329 (6:30 PM EDT)
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
